definitions.definition: A notebook , passed between students or pen pals , for writing gossip or opinions .
An online guestbook of this kind, where each visitor is invited to write personal replies to a set of questions .

main_definition: A notebook , passed between students or pen pals , for writing gossip or opinions .
secondary_definitions: ( Internet ) An online guestbook of this kind, where each visitor is invited to write personal replies to a set of questions .
